sources.title: The Search for Bridey Murphy
sources.description: Title: The Search for Bridey Murphy Summary: After being shown what hypnotism can do, a Doctor sets out to study it in depth. When experimenting on his friend's wife, she regresses back to an earlier life- that of Bridey Murphy. ... Directed by: Noel Langley Actors: Teresa Wright, Louis Hayward, Nancy Gates Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 1 October 1956 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 After being shown what hypnotism can do, a Doctor sets out to study it in depth. When experimenting on his friend's wife, she regresses back to an earlier life- that of Bridey Murphy. Several hypnotic sessions explore the life and death of Murphy, a 19th Century Irish lady who lived in Cork and Belfast from 1798 to 1864. The Doctor then attempts to verify if Bridey Murphy really existed.

metadata.Plot: After being shown what hypnotism can do, a doctor starts to study it in depth. When he experiments on a friend's wife, she regresses into an early life--that of Bridey Murphy. Several hypnotic sessions explore the life and death of this 19th-century Irishwoman who lived in Cork and Belfast from 1978 until 1864, and the doctor attempts to verify that Bridey Murphy actually existed.
metadata.Actors: Teresa Wright, Louis Hayward, Nancy Gates
